Reviews.Title: Does not work with Windows 8.1 - DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: For f you that use WIndows 8.1, this camera is not supported by the Operating System and Swann does not have any drivers.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Inger bey
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd camera I have installed on my home. Well be ordering another. Totally will recommend this item

Reviews.Title: Bought second camera after first one failed
Reviews.Author: Arlene Kullman
Reviews.Content: I Bought this camera to replace a new one given to me as a gift that only lasted about six months. The instructions for setting up could be better with more information. The camera worked good after I got it set up.Glenn
